Indeed..

Those Zulu yari are just as likely to be modern day repros as the=

Chinese fakes on ebay though :-)
Pity they are all mumei though. Tradition=
al weapons are a problem.
When carried at political rallies, the cops daren=
't try and take them
away for fear they are accused of disrespecting cultur=
al items that
aren't weapons..just symbols.
I am sure there are parallels i=
n the Japanese art world, where you
have to ignore the original status of i=
tems as weapons, and see them
in a new light as symbols of history and art.=


Brian
